messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] help my mom?
messages.msgSnippet: After having a question emailed to me I feel the need to clarify a few things. I m an unschooling mother and have been on this list for a couple of months.
messages.messageBody:
After having a question emailed to me I feel the need to clarify a few
things. I'm an unschooling mother and have been on this list for a
couple of months. I've unschooled our two sons for about 6 years. My
mother had to leave when I was 16 and I'm 33. Thanks, Jane

-----Original Message-----
From: Jane [mailto:jane@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 12, 2002 6:35 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] help my mom?

I'm not sure if I should be doing this here but I'm an unschooler in MO
whose mother is innocently in prison and serving a 50 year no-parole
sentence. My sisters have put together a website
http://www.patriciaprewitt.com and we are looking for help. If you know
of anything that could help us please let us know. The whole story is
there and lots of information about our family. Thanks, Jane :-)




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
